testimonials.heading: Hundreds of people already trust us
testimonials.subheading: See what our customers have to say about their experience with Shrnkly.

sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.text: Shrnkly has transformed how we manage our marketing campaigns. The analytics are incredibly detailed and the interface is so intuitive. Highly recommend!

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.text: The best URL shortener I've used. Custom domains, QR codes, and detailed analytics all in one place. It's a game-changer for our social media strategy.

emily.name: Emily Rodriguez
emily.text: As a content creator, tracking link performance is crucial. Shrnkly makes it so easy to see what's working and what's not. Love the clean dashboard!

david.name: David Kim
david.text: We use Shrnkly for all our product links. The reliability is outstanding and the custom domain feature helps build trust with our customers.

lisa.name: Lisa Anderson
lisa.text: The analytics dashboard gives us insights we never had before. We can now optimize our campaigns in real-time. Absolutely worth it!

james.name: James Wilson
james.text: Shrnkly is an essential tool for our startup. It's affordable, powerful, and the support team is incredibly responsive. Can't imagine working without it.

textShareTestimonials.heading: Developers love our text sharing
textShareTestimonials.subheading: See what developers and teams are saying about our text sharing platform.

alex.name: Alex Thompson
alex.text: This text sharing platform has become essential for our team. Sharing code snippets with syntax highlighting is so much easier now. Love the password protection feature!

priya.name: Priya Patel
priya.text: Finally, a text sharing tool that understands developers. Auto-expiration for sensitive configs, view tracking, and it's blazing fast. Highly recommend!

marcus.name: Marcus Johnson
marcus.text: I share code with clients daily. The ability to set view limits and expiration dates gives me peace of mind. The interface is clean and intuitive.

sophie.name: Sophie Chen
sophie.text: Our team uses this for sharing logs, configs, and code reviews. The analytics help me understand what my team is viewing. Game changer for remote collaboration!

daniel.name: Daniel Brown
daniel.text: The syntax highlighting for multiple languages is perfect. I can share Python, Go, or SQL snippets and they always look great. No more screenshotting code!

rachel.name: Rachel Kim
rachel.text: Love how I can share markdown-formatted documentation with my team. The custom slugs make it easy to organize and find shared content later.

cta.subheading: Join thousands of creators and businesses who use Shrnkly to scale their reach and track every click.

faq.heading: Your questions, answered
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about Shrnkly and how it works.

whatIs.a: A URL shortener is a tool that converts long URLs into shorter, more manageable links. These shortened links redirect to the original URL when clicked, making them easier to share on social media, emails, and other platforms.

howWork.a: Simply paste your long URL into our shortener, and Shrnkly will generate a short, unique link for you. You can customize the link, track its performance, and even generate QR codes - all from your dashboard.

isFree.a: Yes! Shrnkly offers a free plan with essential features including link shortening, basic analytics, and QR code generation. We also offer premium plans with advanced features like custom domains and detailed analytics.

canTrack.q: Can I track my shortened links?
canTrack.a: Absolutely! Every shortened link comes with comprehensive analytics including click counts, geographic data, referrer information, device types, and more. You can access all this data from your dashboard.

customDomain.q: Can I use my own custom domain?
customDomain.a: Yes, our premium plans allow you to use your own branded domain for shortened links. This helps build trust and brand recognition with your audience.

howLong.q: How long do shortened links last?
howLong.a: Shortened links created with Shrnkly never expire by default. However, you have the option to set custom expiration dates for your links if needed.

limit.q: Is there a limit to how many links I can create?
limit.a: Free accounts can create up to 100 links per month. Premium plans offer unlimited link creation along with other advanced features.

safe.a: Yes, Shrnkly takes security seriously. We scan all URLs for malicious content and provide SSL encryption for all redirects. We also offer link password protection on premium plans.

cta.subheading: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Join our community or chat with our friendly support team.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At Shrnkly, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our URL shortening service. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when you create an account, shorten a URL, or contact us for support. This may include:
list: URLs you shorten and their original destinations
Usage data and analytics for your shortened links

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new features, and to protect Shrnkly and our users. This includes using data to track link performance, prevent spam and abuse, and personalize your experience.

analytics.title: 4. Data Analytics
analytics.content: When someone clicks on a Shrnkly URL, we collect certain information about the click, such as the IP address (anonymized), geographic location, referrer, and device type. This information is used to provide analytics to the creator of the link and to help us improve our service.

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Shrnkly's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions, then you may not access the website or use any services.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: Shrnkly provides a URL shortening service that allows users to create shorter versions of long URLs. We also provide analytics, QR code generation, and other related services. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any part of the service at any time without notice.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account. You agree not to use Shrnkly for:
list: Distributing malware, viruses, or other harmful code
Creating links to illegal or prohibited content
Any activity that violates local, state, or international laws

expiration.title: 4. Link Content & Expiration
expiration.content: Shrnkly does not claim ownership of the content of the URLs shortened. We reserve the right to disable any link that violates our terms or is deemed inappropriate. Free accounts may have their links subject to certain limits or expiration policies as defined in our pricing guide.

property.title: 5. Intellectual Property
property.content: The Shrnkly name, logo, and all related designs and software are the intellectual property of Shrnkly and its licensors. You may not use our branding without prior written permission.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Shrnkly provides its services "as is" without any warranty. We are not liable for any damages resulting from the use or inability to use our services, including but not limited to lost profits, data loss, or service interruptions.

termination.title: 7. Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at our sole discretion, without notice, for behavior that we believe violates these Terms of Service or is harmful to other users or our business interests.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: Questions about the Terms of Service should be sent to us at:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
